attributes.title: MY CHICKEN SOUP 😪
attributes.review: Okay so as I opened the app I also went to the garage to leave to get me some chicken soup from my great great great great grandmother who has according to me 21300 years old I saw that my car was gone. I was so devastated that I fought my own cockroaches that were  staring at me like I was a crazy but as much as they stared at me the more I stomped at them andddd  while I was at it I put some wapangos to stomp at them even more and then I realized that more were coming and I was crying even more because I couldn’t get my chicken soup. Till this day I will never forget that time I couldn’t get my chicken soup ALL THiS ApPS FAULT.

attributes.title: APP DOESNT WORK
attributes.review: High schooler Tara, a girl so painfully shy that she can't even write a single letter on the board in front of a class, has an awesome secret - she is "Radio Rebel". When Tara puts on that headset in her room and does her daily podcast, she becomes a confident, outspoken, inspiring, anonymous voice on the airwaves. When her stepfather, the owner/producer guy at SLAM radio, finds out that Tara is Radio Rebel, Tara gets to move from her bedroom to a sound studio to do live shows for SLAM. Everything is the perfect amount of chaos until Principal Moreno, whose only goal in life seems to be to destroy others, cancels Prom and all the students blame Rebel.

attributes.title: My Grandmother Will Never Recover
attributes.review: after downloading this app, I began to receive messages in both Russian and Danish. they in short told me that they had found out all of my personal info from this app and have been sending various forms of pastries to my grandmothers house. now, my grandmother is a very healthy woman and these flaky goodies have been taunting her and forcing her to donate to homeless cats. now this sounds good, but she is allergic and because of her kindness these cats have been stalking my dear old grandma. on top of this, my spotify as well as my grandmothers has been playing christian rap music. although this is not classified torturous, i would suggest you sit in a room covered in buttery deliciousness and cats while listening to pastor tim spit bars about chastity. will be voting for biden and deleting immediately.

attributes.title: How is this even an app??
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to educate myself on trumps disastrous plan for his unlikely 2nd term. My phone got a virus and I began to get a bunch of location notifications constantly saying that various sites and platforms were tracking my location. I can’t even take a POOP now without being scared. I think is app is almost as horrible as dOnALd TwUp🥺 Apple... PLEASE remove this dangerous and violating app (and “President”) although he is not very dangerous because he’s just a joke... k. Tanks.

attributes.title: obama for president ❤️
